overview:
SunChaser Media offers leading publishers clarity and exposure, within a controlled portfolio, to maximise premium revenue opportunities.

As a sales representation business, SunChaser reject the network model, and sell site specifically, assisting publishers in evolving their ad product and proposition.

SunChaser Media offers high quality service levels to all stakeholders. Understanding the process between agency, sales rep firm and publisher, to deliver stand out campaigns.

SunChaser Media sells:

  • Display Media
  • Premium Takeovers
  • Video
  • In-Game
  • In-App
  • Mobile
  • Adver-game
  • Social
